news.title: Tech billionaires cashed out $16 billion in 2025 as stocks soared
news.summary: Jeff Bezos led the way. The Amazon founder sold 25 million shares for $5.7 billion in June and July, right around the time he was getting hitched to Lauren Sanchez in Venice.

news.title: California residents can use new tool to demand brokers delete their personal data
news.summary: A new tool should make it easier for California residents to limit data brokers’ ability to store and sell their personal information.

news.title: Bitfinex hacker Ilya Lichtenstein credits Trump for early release from prison
news.summary: Ilya Lichtenstein, who pled guilty to money laundering charges tied to his role in the massive hack of crypto exchange Bitfinex, has apparently been released early from prison.

news.title: India orders Musk’s X to fix Grok over ‘obscene’ AI content
news.summary: India's IT ministry has given X 72 hours to submit an action-taken report.

news.title: 10 useful gadgets for your first apartment
news.summary: From home security systems and smart smoke detectors to a sunrise alarm gently that wakes you up, here are the must-have gadgets for living in your first apartment.

news.title: Surprise, surprise: Silksong wins Steam’s Game of the Year
news.summary: Valve has announced the winners of the 2025 Steam Awards and, unsurprisingly, Hollow Knight: Silksong, took home the Game of the Year honors. news.title: Someone made a ton of money betting on Maduro’s capture
news.summary: Shortly before the US military launched an attack on Venezuela and captured President Nicolás Maduro, an account on Polymarket made some very suspiciously timed investments. news.title: Meta’s Quest 3S is still $50 off and comes with a $50 gift card
news.summary: We posted a couple of times about Meta’s Quest 3S during the holidays. The virtual reality headset that typically sold for $299.99 was — and still is — available for $249.99. news.title: I went to the Stranger Things finale in theaters and the strangest thing happened
news.summary: The parking lot was packed. That's the first Strange Thing. A little background. news.title: Healthy 18-year-old welder nearly died of anthrax—the 9th such puzzling case
news.summary: "Welder's Anthrax" was first coined in 2022, when seven cases had been identified.

news.title: OpenAI reorganizes some teams to build audio-based AI hardware products
news.summary: Voice has lagged in adoption behind screens. OpenAI wants to change that.

news.title: Researchers spot Saturn-sized planet in the “Einstein desert”
news.summary: Rogue, free-floating planets appear to have two distinct origins.

news.title: SpaceX begins “significant reconfiguration” of Starlink satellite constellation
news.summary: "Biggest advantage of lower altitude is that beam diameter is smaller for a given antenna size."

news.title: What Happens Next in Venezuela—and the Rest of Latin America?
news.summary: Donald Trump says that Venezuela's governance will remain in the hands of senior US officials until a "proper and judicious transition" can take place. The rest of the region is on notice.

news.title: Disinformation Floods Social Media After Nicolás Maduro’s Capture
news.summary: From seemingly AI-generated videos to repurposed old footage, TikTok, Instagram, and X did little to stop the onslaught of misleading posts in the wake of the US invasion of Venezuela.

news.title: The US Invaded Venezuela and Captured Nicolás Maduro. ChatGPT Disagrees
news.summary: Some AI chatbots have a surprisingly good handle on breaking news. Others decidedly don’t.

news.title: Stop Using Your Keyboard and Start Using Handy, a Free Speech-to-Text App
news.summary: It’s called Handy, and it uses AI models to accurately convert your speaking voice into text—all for free.
